description.short: Sherpas can create and manage live events for their travelers.
description.full: Engage your travelers in the learning they spend the most time on - right here in Microsoft Teams. The learning + development team can create new learning events, specify who can attend and if event is required or not, and close registration once capacity is reached. Built-in prompts will help make sure events are well attended. By Fer 8a
staticTabs[0].name: Manage events
